title: New: Billie Black – Soothe Me
body:
Having already been stuck with the ‘UK’s answer to BANKS’ tag on several occasions, this new track from **Billie Black**, _Soothe Me_, sounds less Waiting Game, more Radiohead In Rainbows in truth.

Lustful, enigmatic and delicately understated, there’s a beauty and intimacy to it that BANKS has only shown on very brief occasions, and definitely hints at another side to Billie Black. Check it out below.
